docs.lead_paragraph: Volunteers at a medical tent and on a sanitation team are trying to combat the conditions at Zuccotti Park, which have left Occupy Wall Street demonstrators susceptible to viruses.

headline.seo: For Occupy Wall Street, Health Is a Growing Concern
headline.main: A Petri Dish of Activism, and Germs
headline.print_headline: A Petri Dish Of Activism, And Germs

docs.abstract: Volunteers at a medical tent and on a sanitation team are trying to combat unsanitary conditions at Zuccotti Park, which have left Occupy Wall Street demonstrators susceptible to viruses.
docs.snippet: Volunteers at a medical tent and on a sanitation team are trying to combat the conditions at Zuccotti Park, which have left Occupy Wall Street demonstrators susceptible to viruses.

headline.main: At a Big Church, a Small Group Health Solution

docs.abstract: A weight-loss program at Saddleback Church provides the small-group support its members need to maintain healthier lifestyles.
docs.snippet: A weight-loss program at Saddleback Church provides the small-group support its members need to maintain healthier lifestyles.

docs.lead_paragraph: About a year ago, Rev. Rick Warren, the pastor of Saddleback Church in southern California, was conducting a baptism when he noticed something.   As with everything at this megachurch, with some 30,000 members, baptisms are large events - this time, 858 people were being baptized.  "Along about 500 I thought - this is my honest truth, it wasn't a very spiritual thought - we're all fat," Warren told his congregation later.  "I know pastors aren't supposed to be thinking that when they're baptizing, but that was what I thought: we're all fat.  But I'm fat, and I'm a terrible model of this."

headline.main: At a Big Church, a Small Group Health Solution

docs.abstract: A weight-loss program at Saddleback Church provides the small-group support its members need to maintain healthier lifestyles.
docs.snippet: A weight-loss program at Saddleback Church provides the small-group support its members need to maintain healthier lifestyles.

headline.main: Medical Schools Neglect Gay and Gender Issues
headline.print_headline: Scant Time In Training Is Devoted To Sexuality

docs.abstract: Medical students learn little about gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender issues in medical school, a new study reports.
docs.snippet: Medical students learn little about gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgender issues in medical school, a new study reports.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States should commit to a “moon shot” for a consumer health revolution.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by author Frank Moss believes Americans could tap into the ingenuity that put men on the moon and created the Internet to radically cut health care costs and revitalize the economy; describes a future in which technological and engineering advances could move much of health care out of hospitals and doctors' offices and into everyday lives of Americans.
docs.snippet: The United States should commit to a “moon shot” for a consumer health revolution.

docs.lead_paragraph: Treatment once meant a month of intravenous medicines that could cause other damage and were hard to administer in remote hospitals.

headline.seo: Test Seeks Drugs to Fight Parasitic Kala Azar Disease
headline.main: Kala Azar: Four-Year Test Seeks Better Ways to Treat a Persistent Disease Spread by Sand Flies
headline.print_headline: Kala Azar: Four-Year Test Seeks Better Ways to Treat A Persistent Disease Spread by Sand Flies

docs.abstract: Governments of India and Bangladesh, along with coalition of medical organizations, announce four-year test of drugs to treat parasitic disease known as kala azar.
docs.snippet: Treatment once meant a month of intravenous medicines that could cause other damage and were hard to administer in remote hospitals.

docs.lead_paragraph: Modern treatments can do wonders if they are begun before the damage to the eye is irreversible.

headline.seo: Fast Action Can Save Sight if Retina Is Detached or Blocked
headline.main: Act Fast to Save Sight if Signs of Danger to the Retina Appear
headline.print_headline: Act Fast to Save Sight if Signs of Danger to the Retina Appear

docs.abstract: Jane E Brody Personal Health column notes modern treatments for retinal damage can be extremely successful if symptoms are caught early enough.
docs.snippet: Modern treatments can do wonders if they are begun before the damage to the eye is irreversible.
